title: The "Oh my god why have I held onto this for 20 years" Clearout

posts.content: So owning a bus for 26 years you accumulate an awful lot of stuff, and I never seem to get around to selling surplus bits. Well as I have plenty of time with Lockdown so begins a massive clear-out. I will add to the thread daily and if there is any particular bits you are after but I haven't posted up yet just ask if I've got it. All prices include UK postage.

OK First lot

Interior trim pieces. 130cm and 59cm. Both have scratches and show signs of age but no cracks or creases. Longer one has all trim clips, shorter one needs clips. £15 each but postage will be extra as long and delicate pieces





Repro Blanking plate (Modified to take central switch and bolt on) £7
Alternator Stand and new Gasket £10 (I also have a genuine Bosch Alternator that will need repair but you can have it for £10 plus postage)
Empi Bus Shifter in clean but used condition with leather Gaiter and fixings [glow=]Sold[/glow]
Genuine VW Pop out window catch £23
2 wiper arms, genuine VW one has short body (and is missing original bolts) one has long body £13 long, £10 short
Genuine VW 8 Fuse fusebox cover. Yellowed with age and a few scratches but no breaks £10 (I also have an original fuse box retaining clip £5)



Custom and Commercial New Side window rubber £10
Approx 20m Interior panel edging in White (New) £13
Genuine VW engine lid Support springs. One with top screw £8 Without Top screw £6.50
Speedo parts . No price on this as I would be happy to sell off as individual bits if it helps resurrect someone's speedo [glow=]Speedo face and mech sold, glass surround and bulbholder still avaliable[/glow]

Next lot




Genuine VW horn (broken) the bottom bit is broken so for spares only. Happy to strip paint back to original if you would like me to £7
Oil filler extension with breather (all seals in good condition) £8
New unused alternator strap. Stainless steel £10
Elephant ear mirror arms, a bit tatty but good for a rat look £7
Engine lid hinges, 2 repro (one new, both the same make, hinge pins perfect) £18
Genuine VW (Hinge pin a bit sloppy) £10
12V Coil (Unused, was in my Van spare parts kit for travelling but as EFI now not needed) £15
Genuine VW Rear light clusters one is VW Hella (and looks to be the later one) and the other one is VW SWF, all rear pins intact obviously mirroring isn't perfect £18 each

Genuine VW Thermostats.



Missing a bellows rod (easily available new) and need restoration but complete otherwise and working £55 (I have a fan-shroud stashed somewhere for this which can be dug out if required)

Hi,
Geniune VW 66-67 Front door inner handles and Escutcheons are they plastic or metal?
Cant open up the images
i was looking for metal ones,thanks anyway

Tartan Material for interior panels of bus. These were the interior panels of my bus before it's current restoration. I was wanting to use them again but we put the matching seat cushions in storage and a mouse promptly ate them !! Really p****d off as this material cost hundred's of pounds. So took 18 months finding a material that was similar. So I would really like to see this have a second life. My bus is a walkthrough but I rescued one panel of a seat cushion and there is some of the original material spare so you should be able to cover the bulkhead,the material fits the front doors, cargo doors and long side panel plus walkthrough or full length bulkhead. The colour goes really well with sealing wax red or coral buses's . I enclose a photo of the material draped on one of my old door panel's. The material has been thoroughly washed, is not perfect but pretty good and will probably need a bit of a stretch as I washed it at 60 degree's. Only asking £30 as I would love to see it used again (I genuinely cried when that bloody mouse had it's way)

Hi
I’ll take the set of rubbers please.
PM payment details and I’ll sort it in the morning.
Thanks
Mark

Photo of Church key please!
Is the long body wiper repro or does it have vw cast on the back between the mounting screws?
Both wipers are original, the long body has had a small repair with JB weld but almost invisible (can photo if needed) I can combine postage if more than one item is bought

Is the church key still available. If so I’d like it thanks


Sent from my iPhone using Tapatalk
Yep still available. PM me tonight for payment details and I'll get it in the post tomorrow
